The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 January is 3,274,397 (5,817.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 January, there were 210,085 new confirmed cases (373.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 January, there were 273,509 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (63,424 fewer cases).
